comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G7KNmW9a75Y](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DG7KNmW9a75Y) ### Comment > just leave a comment if its about a filter or not. ### Screenshots

AdGuard Base

AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances Other extensions used: | On Hulu ads still come up and when I try to skip it, it goes to a different part of my tv show it doesn't say I have ads but ads still pop up and when I restart adguard it shows where the ads are and won't let me skip them cause of the adblocker.
